external_games.name: Christmas Fables: The Wishing Store - Collector's Edition
Christmas Fables: The Wishing Store - Collector's Edition

name: Christmas Fables: The Wishing Store - Collector's Edition
summary: When Mayor Greedy banishes all holiday cheer, you must join forces with toy maker Nicholas and Rudolf the reindeer to uncover the town's secrets, revive the festive spirit, and prove you're worthy of inheriting a toy empire.
